name: Potential Remote Desktop Connection to Non-Domain Host
description: Detects logons using NTLM to hosts that are potentially not part of the domain.
false_positives: Host connections to valid domains, exclude these.
Host connections not using host FQDN.
Host connections to external legitimate domains.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-NTLM\/Operational AND event.code:8001 AND TargetName:TERMSRV*)`
